transcript:
Agent: Hello, thank you for considering our company. My name is John, and I'm calling about our new smart home security system.
Customer: Hi John, I've been looking into security systems. What makes yours stand out?
Agent: Our system offers real-time monitoring, motion detection, and alerts sent directly to your phone.
Customer: That sounds good. I've had some issues with break-ins in my neighborhood.
Agent: I understand your concern. Our system is designed to provide an extra layer of protection and peace of mind.
Customer: How much does it cost?
Agent: The basic package starts at $99 a month, with a one-time installation fee of $200.
Customer: That's a bit higher than I expected. Do you have any promotions or discounts?
Agent: Actually, we're running a special offer right now. If you sign up within the next 48 hours, we'll waive the installation fee.
Customer: That sounds like a good deal. What kind of support do you offer?
Agent: We have 24/7 customer support and a dedicated team to help with any questions or issues.
Customer: Okay, I'm interested. Can you email me the details and a contract to review?
Agent: Absolutely. I'll send that over to you right away. Would you like me to follow up with you tomorrow to answer any questions?
Customer: Yes, that would be great. Thank you, John.
Agent: You're welcome. I look forward to speaking with you tomorrow.
Customer: Have a good day.
Agent: You too, thank you.
